channel.title: [WiP] UserbarGenerator Redesign!
channel.description:
Hey Guys!
I'm not really very active on here anymore.. but meh!
I've posted a more or less identical post in the Web Design section so I can gain feedback on the composition etc from the web side of things. Here I'm looking for feedback on the design itself. :)
Basically, over the last month or so I've been developing my site 'UserbarGenerator.com'. It's a one click script which automatically generates stunning userbars absolutely free. When I was designing the site, I focused more on the script than the aesthetics, and now it's time to turn that around!
During the revamp so far, I've developed two versions.. Firstly V1, which can be displayed [url=http://"http://i36.tinypic.com/2u8jcdk.png"]here[/url]! And secondly V2, which is the most recent. You can view that below!
[img]http://i38.tinypic.com/260c03k.jpg[/img]
Basically what I'd like you to do, is give me advice & feedback on the layout as I progress. Give me comments on what you like and dislike, and pay special attention to the improvements made over each update!
Thanks! -[url=http://"http://www.jamesy.net"]James[/url]

item.title: [WiP] UserbarGenerator Redesign!
item.dc:creator: @lordbost lordbost
item.description:
@lordbost wrote:

Well the site looks great.
kinda offtopic: I took a look at your site, but it didn’t manage to make a single userbar, only got this error:

[code]
Warning: mysql_num_rows(): supplied argument is not a valid MySQL result resource in /mnt/w0903/d20/s37/b02cedac/www/userbargenerator.com/userbar.php on line 77

Warning: mysql_num_rows(): supplied argument is not a valid MySQL result resource in /mnt/w0903/d20/s37/b02cedac/www/userbargenerator.com/userbar.php on line 141
The following errors occurred:
Invalid hash value.[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: [WiP] UserbarGenerator Redesign!
item.dc:creator: @Cald_Panda Cald Panda
item.description:
@Cald_Panda wrote:

[quote=“Cruzer, post:6, topic:231344”][quote author=Cald Panda link=topic=304690.msg2456236#msg2456236 date=1222254732]
Too bad if you had a slow internet connection. Otherwise it looks nice.
[/quote]
What does that have to do with anything?[/quote]Half the page is images. If you have a slow internet connection they page will take a fair bit more time to load.

Read full topic
